00059 #define XN_INFINITE   (0)
00060 #define XN_NONBLOCK   ((xnticks_t)-1)

00063 #define XN_NO_TICK         ((xnticks_t)-1)
00064 
00065 #define testbits(flags,mask) ((flags) & (mask))
00066 #define setbits(flags,mask)  xnarch_atomic_set_mask(&(flags),mask)
00067 #define clrbits(flags,mask)  xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(&(flags),mask)
00068 #define __testbits(flags,mask) testbits(flags,mask)
00069 #define __setbits(flags,mask)  do { (flags) |= (mask); } while(0)
00070 #define __clrbits(flags,mask)  do { (flags) &= ~(mask); } while(0)
00071 
00072 typedef atomic_flags_t xnflags_t;
00073 
00074 #ifndef NULL
00075 #define NULL 0
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 #define XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN 32
00079 
00080 static inline void xnobject_copy_name (char *dst,
00081                                        const char *src)
00082 {
00083     if (src)
00084         {
00085         const char *rp = src;
00086         char *wp = dst;
00087         do
00088             *wp++ = *rp;
00089         while (*rp && rp++ - src < XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN);
00090         }
00091     else
00092         *dst = '\0';
00093 }
00094 
00095 #define minval(a,b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))
00096 #define maxval(a,b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))

00104 const char *xnpod_fatal_helper(const char *format, ...);
00105 
00106 #ifdef __cplusplus
00107 }
00108 #endif
00109 
00110 #define xnpod_fatal(format,args...) \
00111 do { \
00112    const char *panic = xnpod_fatal_helper(format,##args); \
00113    xnarch_halt(panic); \
00114 } while (0)
